game.name: SEARCH ALL - STEAMPUNK
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the bolts and screws on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling"
game.shortDescriptionEn: is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the bolts and screws on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling"

reviewHighlights.text: This is my 2nd favourite in the SEARCH ALL series following "foxes". The bolts and screws are well hidden; using the zoom function will be mandatory....
Def a more challenging hidden puzzle game than the other games in this genre. Still comes with easy achievements and chill music.
